lines.text: I can feel my I.Q. getting lower by the minute!
[as thousands of ping-pong balls fall from the ceiling... ]
Only one man could have done this!
Yes, but Captain Kangaroo's been in re-runs for years.
There's nothing on that's either rare or well-done.
Taste cold justice, you disreputable henchmen-types.
Beware! I am The Cow. Moo!
